title: Cumulative households, cumulative income on Lorenz

content.question: The Lorenz curve represents the relationship between

choices.label: the cumulative percentage of households and the cumulative percentage of income
income tax rates and income tax revenues
child labor rates and the poverty levels
market structure and the number of firms in the market

content.answer: the cumulative percentage of households and the cumulative percentage of income

unit.text: 6: Market Failure and the Role of Government

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
